entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
Hello! I’m Nishi Kanta Paul, a Computer Science graduate from Ahsanullah University of Science and Technology (Top 7 in class).

I’m passionate about AI, computer vision, and medical imaging. I currently contribute to an AI-based Parkinson’s Disease Screening project with researchers from UAB and Temple University.

3000+ problems solved on Codeforces, LeetCode, and CodeChef have helped me strengthen my algorithmic thinking.

I work as a Trainee Software Engineer at Brain Station 23 PLC, building scalable web apps using React, TypeScript, and Next.js.

My work on driver distraction detection using transfer learning was published in an international conference.

I’m now actively seeking fully funded research opportunities in:

  • AI for healthcare and diagnostics
  • Deep learning and computer vision
  • Algorithm design & optimization
  • Modern frontend engineering (React/Next.js)

Always open to collaborations—feel free to reach out!
